    Slider & Progress

    • Slider
    • Progress Bar
    • Progress Spinner

    Slider

    0

    Tooltip Slider

    0

    Just add the class bubble when calling the ui-slider component to display the output element as a tooltip.

                                
                                <!-- SLIDER -->
                                <p class="ui-slider">
                                    <label for="slider1">Choose a value</label>
                                    <!-- Input type RANGE -->
                                    <input type="range" id="slider1" min="0" max="50" step="1" value="25" />
                                    <!-- Output for display change value -->
                                    <span for="slider1" class="output" id="output">0</span>
                                </p>
                            
                        
                                .toto {
                                color: #FFF;
                            }

    Progress Bar

                                
                                <!-- PROGRESS BAR -->
                                <p class="ui-progress-bar">
                                    <label for="prog1">Progress</label>
                                    <progress id="prog1" name="prog1" max="100" value="30" disabled="disabled"></progress>
                                </p>
                            
                        
                                .toto {
                                color: #FFF;
                            }
